short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances SEMrush Keyword Magic Tool by revealing all keywords in the sidebar and enabling easy data extraction to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝐀𝐮𝐠𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟒 𝐔𝐩𝐝𝐚𝐭𝐞 - 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝟏.𝟓:
• Download Button: Added a button to download extracted data as a CSV.
• UI Update: Refined the user interface for better usability.
• Bug Fixes: Fixed minor bugs for smoother operation.
----
The SEMRush Enhancer is a user-friendly Chrome extension tailored for SEO professionals using SEMrush’s Keyword Magic Tool. This extension streamlines keyword management by automating the process of revealing and copying keywords directly from SEMrush pages. It saves time by continuously displaying more keywords with just a click, eliminating the need for manual input.

With its versatile copying feature, users can choose to copy either just the keywords or both keywords and associated data like search volumes to the clipboard. This allows for easy editing—remove unwanted terms and then paste the refined list back into SEMrush’s fields to filter out irrelevant keywords efficiently.

Ideal for enhancing SEO efficiency, the SEMRush Enhancer ensures a smoother, faster keyword research experience, making it a must-have tool for SEO professionals looking to optimize their workflows and focus more on strategic analysis.
